product.title: Dopey Gets Lost | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Dopey Gets Lost

Disney’s dwarfs have kept young readers laughing since 1937. In this reprise, Dopey gets separated from the other six dwarfs and loses his way in the enchanted wood. He’s ultimately united with his friends, but not before he learns a valuable lesson about walking off with strangers.

Tie-in Activity: Review safety procedures with your child, stressing the importance of staying close to home and never leaving with a stranger under any circumstances. Discuss “what if” scenarios and develop a plan with your child to put into action should he ever get lost or separated from you in a crowd.
